void mos_queue_init (  queue_t *  q,
uint8_t *  buffer,
uint8_t  size
) 
 

Init the queue.

Inits a new byte queue. The elements of the queue will be stored in buffer.

Parameters:
q Queue to init
buffer A byte array
size Size of buffer

uint8_t  index,
uint8_t *  byte
) 
 

"peek" one byte from the queue.

Doesn't delete the byte, just looks

Parameters:

index Index to peek at
byte Peeked byte
Returns:
Q_OK, Q_EMPTY
